updatePaymentMethods.title: Mollie Payments
updatePaymentMethods.succeeded: The payment methods are successfully updated.
updatePaymentMethods.failed: The payment methods couldn't be updated.

refund.title: Refund through Mollie
refund.success: A refund has been created in Mollie. It may take 2 hours for the refund to complete. Until this time, you can cancel the refund.
refund.error: Something went wrong creating a refund.

warning.low-amount: Please enter an amount to be refunded.

status-description.queued: The refund is queued until there is enough balance to process te refund. You can still cancel the refund.
status-description.pending: The refund will be sent to the bank on the next business day. You can still cancel the refund.
status-description.processing: The refund has been sent to the bank. The refund amount will be transferred to the consumer account as soon as possible.
status-description.refunded: The refund amount has been transferred to the consumer.
status-description.failed: The refund has failed after processing. For example, the customer has closed his / her bank account. The funds will be returned to your account.

shipping.title: Ship an order line item through Mollie
shipping.content: Fill out the quantity of this item ({shippableQuantity} out of {quantity} left to ship) to be shipped to the customer.

modal.title: Ship Order
modal.description: This action will automatically ship an order through Mollie. The flow sequence will receive the order number, and pass this on to the Mollie API. Successful shipments and failed shipments will be visible in the Mollie log files.

modal.title: Refund Order
modal.description: This action will automatically start a refund through Mollie. The flow sequence will receive the order number, and pass this on to the Mollie API. Successful refunds and failed refunds will be visible in the Mollie log files.
modal.warning: Please keep in mind, that refunds might take up to 2 hours to be finalized and visible in the shop. Until then you can always cancel a pending refund either from the order page in Shopware or from the Mollie Dashboard.

sw-payment.apiLinkButton: Get your API keys from the Mollie Dashboard
